# OpenApiDocDescriptor.ToYaml method

Serializes the OpenAPI document to a YAML string.

```csharp
public string ToYaml(OpenApiSpecVersion version)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| version | The OpenAPI specification version to serialize as. |

## Return Value

The serialized YAML string.
